name: Santa Siege
description:
WASD - Move Helicopter

LMB - Fire 

L.CTRL - Lower Altitude

SPACE - Increase Altitude

E - Barrel Roll

You have had your presents confiscated by the border forces, Reclaim them and deliver them to the village on the other side of the  DMZ. Break the Barracks and fly over the rainbow indicator to collect presents. Fly over the cabins to deliver them.

There is a 10 minute timer, which will effect your score

Credits:
Tech Art: https://toku22.itch.io/

Gameplay: https://rinzii.itch.io/

Soldier: https://andykerrart.artstation.com/projects
